meanings.definition: A hard or painful corn on the foot.
meanings.sent1: The clavus on my foot made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: She had to buy special shoes to accommodate the clavus on her toe.
meanings.sent3: The clavus on his foot felt like a tiny rock stuck in his shoe.
meanings.sent4: The clavus seemed to grow roots into her skin, causing immense discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The clavus throbbed with every step, a constant reminder of the pain.

meanings.sent1: He hammered the clavus into the wooden plank.
meanings.sent2: The clavus held the picture frame securely on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The clavus rolled off the table and landed pointy side up.
meanings.sent4: The clavus gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting its sharp tip.
meanings.sent5: She accidentally stepped on the clavus, causing a sharp pain in her foot.
